long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert any URL into engaging videos in a few clicks. Boost your content strategy with Topview AI — perfect for social media!

Effortlessly convert any URL into engaging videos in just a few clicks. Enhance your content strategy with Topview.ai — perfect for social media sharing!

🔹 Why use it
Leveraging Topview AI technology for video creation offers several key benefits:
🌟 Create Product demo, or video, or ads in minutes, not hours.
🌟 Easy to use UI, no editing skill needed. Generate a video with several clicks, AI does everything for you.
🌟 Save time & money, create a video or ads without a camera.
🌟 And get more converting by instantly engaging hook.

🔹 Key features
🌟 AI Script Generator: trained by Top ADS video, using most viral hook, powered by OpenAI's 
🌟 AI Video Generator: auto generate clip base on text you input.
🌟 AI Talking Photo: upload 
🌟 AI Video Editor: effortless ai video editor, AI selects clips, generates voice, with AI characters.
🌟 Ultra Realistic AI Voice Generator: powered by elevenlabs TTS, 
🌟 500+ Diverser Avatar, and you can create your own avatar.

🔹 What for:
🌟 Amazon/Shopify/shoppee/aliexpress URL to Video: auto extract product info from your website, download images & videos, make a video base on the webpage.
🌟 Landing Page to video
🌟 Website to video
🌟 Article to video: rewrite engaging script from article, and generate videos base on the images from article and the stock AI avatar 

🔹 How to Use the Extension to Convert a URL to Video with AI
1. Navigate to the website you want to create a video from, and click on the Topview extension icon in the top right corner of your browser.
2. Hit the "Convert Webpage to Video" button to let the AI analyze the webpage content.
3. After the analysis is complete, simply generate the video with one click.

We can help u to make video creation from any webpage quick and easy.
